field_metadata.description: These lists are dynamic and will reflect what is currently live on the site.
field_metadata.instruction:
Content will appear on the different PLP pages based on the targeting selection below, there's a 1:1 relationship with each PLP type and the options below.
For Brand Category PLPs both Category and Brand Target need to be specified.
These are the category PLP pages where the content will appear.
These are the brand PLP pages where the content will appear.
These are the collection PLP pages where the content will appear.

The content will appear on pages when the specified search terms are used. The input needs to be exact match with the user input and is case insensitive.
Using all lowercase inputs is recommended.

description: Provide a way to show relevant information to customers with the aid of visuals and CTAs to specific actions related to that promotion/campaign presented within the buying journey on a relevant PLP page

field_metadata.instruction: Use the project name in the Wrike ticket as the title.
This copy is optional.
This selection represents the formatting options for the product list.
By selecting this property, the product list will only show sale variants.
By selecting this property, the product list will retain product selections that go out of stock.
These options will provide the logic that can be used when populating the product list component.

This widget gives you the ability to find products to build the list.

Use Search for products that are live onsite. Use Product ID for a product that is not yet live onsite.
